00041     class _OgreExport LogListener
00042     {
00043     public:
00046         virtual void write( const String& name,
00047                             const String& message, 
00048                             LogMessageLevel lml = LML_NORMAL, 
00049                             bool maskDebug = false ) = 0;
00050         virtual ~LogListener();
00051     };
00052 
00071     class _OgreExport LogManager : public Singleton<LogManager>
00072     {
00073         friend class Log;
00074 
00075     protected:
00076 
00080         void _routeMessage( const String& name,
00081                             const String& message, 
00082                             LogMessageLevel lml = LML_NORMAL, 
00083                             bool maskDebug = false );
00084 
00085         typedef std::map<String, Log*, std::less<String> >  LogList;
00086         typedef std::vector<LogListener*>                   LogListenerList;
00087 
00089         LogList mLogs;
00090 
00092         Log* mDefaultLog;
00093 
00095         LogListenerList mListeners;
00096 
00097     public:
00098         LogManager();
00099         ~LogManager();
00100 
00105         void addListener( LogListener * listener );
00106         
00111         void removeListener( LogListener * listener );
00112 
00129         Log* createLog( const String& name, bool defaultLog = false, bool debuggerOutput = true, 
00130             bool suppressFileOutput = false);
00131 
00134         Log* getLog( const String& name);
00135 
00138         Log* getDefaultLog();
00139 
00143         Log* setDefaultLog(Log* newLog);
00144 
00147         void logMessage( const String& message, LogMessageLevel lml = LML_NORMAL, 
00148             bool maskDebug = false);
00149 
00152         void logMessage( LogMessageLevel lml, const String& message,  
00153             bool maskDebug = false) { logMessage(message, lml, maskDebug); }
00154
